mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginiae partis australis, et Floridae partis orientalis, interjacentiumq[ue] regionum nova descriptio
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Blaeu, Willem Janszoon, 1571-1638 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : hand col. ; 38 x 49 cm. on sheet 48 x 63 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Covers Atlantic Coast from Virginia to Florida. [original]
Bar scale above the neat line on the lower margin: Milliaria Germanica communia. [original]
Possibly from Blaeu's Grooten atlas, Amsterdam, 1664-1665. Cf. Cumming, and Phillips, Geographical atlases, no. 471. [original]
Includes decorative cartouche and coats of arms. [original]
Descriptive text in Dutch on verso, with caption title "Florida," signature mark "H" and catchword "sijn." Page number "9" at upper right. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: South Atlantic States--Maps--Early works to 1800
